video_context.title: React Course - Beginner's Tutorial for React JavaScript Library [2022]
video_context.description:
🎉 Watch the updated version of this course: https://youtu.be/x4rFhThSX04

Learn React by building eight real-world projects and solving 140+ coding challenges. You can also follow this course interactively on Scrimba.

This comprehensive course will teach you React from the ground up. The course is divided into 12 sections:

1. React Basics & JSX
2. Data-driven React
3. React State
4. Conditional Rendering
5. Forms in React
6. Side Effects
7. Project: Tenzies Game
8. React Router
9. React Context
10. Advanced React
11. Capstone Project
12. Next Steps

Throughout the course, you'll build practical projects including:
- Business card generator
- Travel journal
- Meme generator
- Notes app
- Tenzies dice game
- Quizzical trivia app
